title: n30n
author: n30n
content: Meet GameXplorer.io which is the first shop based on the HashUp protocol that allows the licensing of games on web3. In short, you can sell games from web2 in the form of ERC-20 tokens, which show in fanct the rights to play. You buy the games with USDC, and launch them using the PC HashUp launcher: HashUp.ithttp://cdn.hashup.it/gamexplorer-homepage.png
